title: Oil Steady as Traders Take Stock of Iran Tensions and Stockpiles
description: Oil held a gain as traders focused on tensions between the US and Iran that have overshadowed signs of swelling supplies.
content: Oil held a gain as traders focused on tensions between the US and Iran that have overshadowed signs of swelling supplies.
